content.raw:
Just as a note, I tried this on another machine and got the same issue.  The command Steve sent only works when used in conjunction with the commands Jose sent.  

 ``` dpkg -r drcsim``` 

 ```apt-get install -f```

 ```apt-get remove ros-hydro-gazebo*```

 ```apt-get install drcsim```

 ```dpkg -r ros-hydro-gazebo3-msgs```

Is there any plan to fix this issue in the repo, as it does not seem to be isolated to my machine?
content.html:
Just as a note, I tried this on another machine and got the same issue. The command Steve sent only works when used in conjunction with the commands Jose sent.

dpkg -r drcsim

apt-get install -f

apt-get remove ros-hydro-gazebo*

apt-get install drcsim

dpkg -r ros-hydro-gazebo3-msgs

Is there any plan to fix this issue in the repo, as it does not seem to be isolated to my machine?
